name: Exposure
description: Exposure is a story-driven first-person survival horror. Find the connection between your wife's death and the mysteries of the past, but be careful on the road to the truth you can expect anything.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Core i3 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Core i5 2.8 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11
